articles.description: Social media users tore into a Sky News anchor after she made a dismissive comment to a 13-year-old gamer in her report on him being the first ever person to beat Nintendo’s version of “Tetri…
articles.content: Social media users tore into a Sky News anchor this week after she made a dismissive comment to a 13-year-old gamer in her report on him being the first ever person to beat Nintendos version of “Tetr… [+2217 chars]
